author: Tyler Conway
title: Video: Donovan Mitchell, Jazz Beat Ronnie 2K, Mavs in NBA 2K20's Latest #2KSim
description: Donovan Mitchell  is often tasked with being the closer for the real-life Utah Jazz, and that was the case Thursday in the virtual world as he took over down the stretch to beat Ronnie 2K, 101-94, in a Twitch stream...
content:
Alex Goodlett/Getty Images
Donovan Mitchell is often tasked with being the closer for the real-life Utah Jazz, and that was the case Thursday in the virtual world as he took over down the stretch to beat Ronnie 2K, 101-94, in a Twitch stream.
NBA 2K20@NBA2K… [+978 chars]
